# Changes in version 0.9.25.9000-2 (2024-06-24)

**This package version requires R \>= 4.3**

## Bugfixes

### read_BIN2R()

- `ignore.RECTYPE` now supports numeric values, e.g., 128. Records for
  this type will be ignored during import.
